attributes.action: Stop Cabazitaxal being removed from available drugs list for prostrate cancer patients
attributes.additional_details:
Stop Cabazitaxal being removed from available drugs list for prostrate cancer patients. This is the best drug to treat advanced forms of cancer but Jeremy Hunt the Health Secretary wants to remove it from the list  as soon as possible due to cost! This drug gives men quality of life, if removed men will have to revert to 'stilboestrol' which have been around since the 1950's
and is know to cause side effects / problems and can be toxic. Help us fight to keep their quality of life, remember prostrate cancer attacks men of all ages. Thank You.

rejection.details: The Cancer Drugs Fund is the responsibility of NHS England, not the Department of Health or HM Government.
